section.heading: Administrative petitions and civil claims.
section.text: Any person unjustly convicted of and subsequently imprisoned for a felony offense contained in the District of Columbia Official Code may:

para.text: Present a claim for damages against the District of Columbia; or
Petition the District of Columbia for compensation as provided under this subchapter.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 1012(a) of Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2017 (D.C. Act 22-104, July 20, 2017, 64 DCR 7032).
